title: By the King. A proclamation by His Majestie, requiring the aid and assistance of all his subjects on the northside Trent, and within twenty miles southward thereof, for the suppressing of the rebels, now marching against Him.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publicationStmtPublisher: by Robert Barker printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,
